cards.name: Whizpar
cards.flavorText: The unfriendly ghost...

cards.name: Pushhh
cards.description: Entry: Return a zombie to its owner's Hand
cards.flavorText: Like any adolescent child that wishes you to leave him be... so GO AWAY!!

cards.name: Ztormcaller
cards.flavorText: Thor's best student just got a little angrier...

cards.name: ZeuZ
cards.flavorText: From mount Zolympus in the sky - fear Ze-might of ZeuZ!

cards.name: Rockky
cards.flavorText: Addriaaannn!!! Addriaaaaaannnnn!!!

cards.name: Golem
cards.flavorText: mmMMWhaaaaat?

cards.name: Mountain
cards.flavorText: When the mountain comes to you... you'll run!

cards.name: Walley
cards.flavorText: "Eeeeeeva"

cards.name: Pyromaz
cards.flavorText: He's really into that old Prodigy song... Firestarter...

cards.name: Burrrnn
cards.flavorText: So he likes all the pretty bright colors, can you blame him?

cards.name: Cynderman
cards.flavorText: Hot, so very hot - all the time!

cards.name: Gargantua
cards.flavorText: (sing) Under pressure... coming down on you...

cards.name: Fire-Maw
cards.flavorText: There's always an aftershock, duck twice

cards.name: Stapler
cards.flavorText: No pain, no gain.

cards.name: Nail Bomb
cards.description: 4 damage to a zombie, and adjacent zombies
cards.flavorText: When you really want to nail it!

cards.name: Goo Bottles
cards.flavorText: Adding more goo to an already overly-goo-ed party is just too goo-d!

cards.name: Chainsaw
cards.description: +4 Atk to a zombie; End: 4 damage to this zombie
cards.flavorText: Cutting through flesh, bone and even steel, it's easy to see why this is a fan-favorite!

cards.name: Azuraz
cards.flavorText: Beeee yourself!

cards.name: Shroom
cards.flavorText: Some like to grow flowers, others grow hallucinogenic poison mushrooms...

cards.name: Vindrom
cards.flavorText: BDSM much?!

cards.name: Shammann
cards.flavorText: Dancing around a fire alone is a hoot, but bringing all your dead friends to join is a party!

cards.name: Puffer
cards.description: Entry: +1 Atk to all Life zombies in play
cards.flavorText: All the pretty pretty flowers

cards.name: Poizom
cards.flavorText: Just like any frat boy, after the Friday night bash - bloated, gassy, puking and generally unpleasant to be around...

cards.name: Ghoul
cards.flavorText: Being dead has its perks, but in this case time and humidity has not been kind - the rotting flesh is literally sapping off the bone on this one.

cards.name: Hazmaz
cards.flavorText: Being cooped up inside a plastic suit is no fun - now multiple this by 1,000 with all the extra gases, something's gotta give...

cards.name: Cherno-bill
cards.flavorText: Lumbering around in a world made of butter gets old real fast, maybe that's why he's sooo angry!

cards.name: Izze
cards.flavorText: It would be a-lot Izzier if you just stay put!

cards.name: Jetter
cards.flavorText: Most welcomed during hot summer days on the busy city streets.

cards.name: Freezzee
cards.description: Entry: Freeze zombie and adjacent zombies, 2 damage if Frozen
cards.flavorText: How he loves decorating with ice sculptures... Everywhere!

cards.name: Tzunamy
cards.description: Entry: 3 damage to all enemies, then Freeze them
cards.flavorText: Bringing a nice, big shower, cleaning an entire city at a time.

cards.name: Bouncer
cards.flavorText: From a young age he just loves to bounce things - especially rocks... on other rocks...

cards.name: Wheezy
cards.description: Entry: A random card in your Hand gets -1 cost
cards.flavorText: Ommmmmmmmmmm

cards.name: Tiny
cards.flavorText: Cooookie... just one more cooookie...

cards.name: Earthshaker
cards.flavorText: Will break ALL your WALLS!!

cards.name: Cerberus
cards.flavorText: It's ALWAYS a party of three.

cards.name: Werezomb
cards.description: Feral, Entry: Give a Random ally Fire zombie Blitz
cards.flavorText: Stop, stop, stop, shh-shh, you'll cause a howl

cards.name: Z-Virus
cards.flavorText: There ain't no party like a Z-Virus party!

cards.name: Yggdrazil
cards.description: Entry: Summon all Life zombies that died this match
cards.flavorText: In this case, lots of strings attached!!

cards.name: Sapper
cards.description: Attack: Restore Def every time this deals damage
cards.flavorText: Hungry, always so very hungry

cards.name: Keeper
cards.flavorText: They are usually such lovely beasts...

cards.name: Zpitter
cards.flavorText: Llama in my living room... bam ba balalam babam ba ba...

cards.name: Zeeter
cards.description: Entry: Devour an ally zombie, get its Atk and Def
cards.flavorText: Nam, naam nam nam namm nam...

cards.name: Zhatterer
cards.flavorText: So the other day Gargantua asked for a toothpick.. and it needs to be really cold to actually work...

cards.name: Znowman
cards.flavorText: Maybe the snow does have some magical power?! But not yellow snow...

cards.name: Soothsayer
cards.flavorText: Almost as good as a fortune cookie... minus the cookie

cards.name: Spiker
cards.flavorText: Standing really still... maybe they won't notice

cards.name: IgneouZ
cards.description: Entry: +2 Def if your Overlord has 10 def or less
cards.flavorText: Mmmm, nothing like the smell of fresh cinder and ash in the morning

cards.name: Zhampion
cards.description: Feral, Entry: Summon two enemy Pyromaz zombies
cards.flavorText: I AM THE CHAMPION - my friend!! ME - ONLY ME!!!

cards.name: Goo Beaker
cards.flavorText: So much goo, so little space

cards.name: Bloomer
cards.description: Entry: Draw a card if you have a Life zombie in play
cards.flavorText: Fertilizing the flowers on an hourly basis

cards.name: Zludge
cards.flavorText: Bring it, bring It, BRING IT ON!!!

cards.name: Blizzard
cards.flavorText: If you can't join them, FREEZE them!

cards.name: Ztormonk
cards.flavorText: Just be a good sentinel and -

cards.name: Draft
cards.description: Entry: Draw a card from the enemy Deck
cards.flavorText: Not your father... hopefully

cards.name: MonZoon
cards.description: Costs 1 less for each Air zombie in your Hand
cards.flavorText: Shock therapy does work wonders

cards.name: Blocker
cards.flavorText: Just a few more moments...

cards.name: Slab
cards.flavorText: Supressing all those emotions does have its price...

cards.name: Pyrite
cards.description: Heavy, Delayed 2: This loses Heavy but gets +4 Atk
cards.flavorText: Angry enough to go though a WALL!

cards.name: Gaea
cards.description: Entry: All ally Earth zombies in play get +2 Atk
cards.flavorText: Either super charismatic, or super scary... or both.

cards.name: Fresh Meat
cards.description: Entry: All enemy zombies get -3 Atk until the end of turn
cards.flavorText: As if they died again and went to zombie heaven

cards.name: Ectoplasm
cards.flavorText: Wha'ch yu lookin at' ?!

cards.name: GooZilla
cards.description: Entry: Use all your goo for 2x Atk / Def
cards.flavorText: More, more, MORE GOO! Bring me ALL the GOO

cards.name: Maelstrom
cards.description: Entry: Return all other zombies to their owners' Hands
cards.flavorText: Sometimes pukes a little in his mouth from all the spinning, but keeps a scary face!

cards.name: FumeZ
cards.description: Entry: Add a Tainted Goo to your Hand if Kalile is your Overlord
cards.flavorText: RAZENGAAAAAAAA!!!

cards.name: Gaz
cards.description: Guard, Entry: Add a Corrupted Goo to your Hand if Kalile is your Overlord
cards.flavorText: No, no, no no, not a hamster, not a hamster ball....

cards.name: Pit
cards.description: Entry: Add a Tainted Goo to your Hand if Brakuus is your Overlord
cards.flavorText: Hard to save every drop with all the spillage

cards.name: Crater
cards.description: Heavy, Entry: Add a Corrupted Goo to your Hand if Brakuus is your Overlord
cards.flavorText: Try to veer from his major crater issues... it may goo deeeeep

cards.name: Quazi
cards.description: Entry: Add a Tainted Goo to your Hand if Razu is your Overlord
cards.flavorText: Has a great fascination with church bells...

cards.name: Modo
cards.description: Blitz, Entry: Add a Corrupted Goo to your Hand if Razu is your Overlord
cards.flavorText: JuuuZZZt WaNt a LiTtlE hUgGG...

cards.name: Zap
cards.description: Entry: Add a Tainted Goo to your Hand if Valash is your Overlord
cards.flavorText: Can't get enough of that goo, ever

cards.name: Cactuz
cards.description: Reanimate, Entry: Add a Corrupted Goo to your Hand if Valash is your Overlord
cards.flavorText: And so he walked the desert for 40 years, only to find he's been walking in circles....

cards.name: Zeptic
cards.description: Overflow 3, Entry: Deal 2 damage to your Overlord
cards.flavorText: After four steps he gave up on the straight line and started puking

cards.name: Hazzard
cards.description: Destroy, Entry: Add a Corrupted Goo to your Hand if Mhalik is your Overlord
cards.flavorText: Almost reached the Goo-Anonymous meeting - almost...

cards.name: Ozmoziz
cards.description: Entry: Add a Tainted Goo to your Hand if Vash'Kala is your Overlord
cards.flavorText: He always loved to tell a goo story

cards.name: Geyzer
cards.description: Freeze, Entry: Add a Corrupted Goo to your hand if Vash'Kala is your Overlord
cards.flavorText: Not in the mood for dancing...

cards.name: Tainted Goo
cards.description: Overflow 3, Disables 1 goo vial for next turn
cards.flavorText: Smells kinda funny, but what a rush!

cards.name: Corrupted Goo
cards.description: Overflow 6, Disables 2 goo vials for next turn
cards.flavorText: Hooooweeee, better than all the moonshine!

cards.name: Whistle
cards.flavorText: Get over here, STAT!

cards.name: Znowy
cards.flavorText: eeeehhehehehe

cards.name: Wazte
cards.flavorText: Smells like goo spirit

cards.name: Ztalagmite
cards.flavorText: He remembers the north

cards.name: Igloo
cards.flavorText: The cold never bothered him anyway

cards.name: Froztbite
cards.flavorText: He's been trying to get out for a millennia - thank you global warming!!

cards.name: Amber
cards.flavorText: Literally a walking museum

cards.name: Bark
cards.flavorText: Worse than its bite!

cards.name: Germ
cards.description: Entry: Add a Tainted Goo to your Hand if Mhalik is your Overlord
cards.flavorText: Ploop... oh.. there goes another arm...

cards.name: Ember
cards.flavorText: Makes every BBQ a hoot!

cards.name: Firewall
cards.flavorText: Having a pyromaniac on the battlefield does come in handy

cards.name: BurZt
cards.flavorText: Some just like it hot!

cards.name: Extinguisher
cards.flavorText: Psssshhhhhhhhhhh

cards.name: Lawnmower
cards.flavorText: It can handle both plants and zombies... wait what?

cards.name: Shovel
cards.description: 3 damage to an enemy OR restore 3 Def to an ally
cards.flavorText: Friendly neighborhood shovel!

cards.name: Shale
cards.flavorText: Thatta boy!

cards.name: Hardy
cards.flavorText: This will BE, the preetiest castle in all the land!

cards.name: Breezee
cards.flavorText: Levitating - not as easy as you'd think...

cards.name: Banshee
cards.flavorText: Booked until next year in haunted houses everywhere

cards.name: Zhocker
cards.flavorText: Getting jiggy with it

cards.name: Bolderr
cards.flavorText: One more step, just one more step!

cards.name: Zlimey
cards.flavorText: Likes to sprinkle toxic goo on EVERYTHING

cards.name: Azzazzin
cards.flavorText: From the Shadowzzzz

cards.name: PreZerver
cards.flavorText: Need a hand?

cards.name: Zephyr
cards.description: Cost 1 less if you have an Air zombie in play
cards.flavorText: Do you want to buy AIR for a penny??

cards.name: BlaZter
cards.flavorText: Dodgeball anyone?

cards.name: Zlinger
cards.flavorText: Ohhh snap!! He got'cha good

cards.name: Mind Flayer
cards.description: Entry: Take control of a random enemy zombie
cards.flavorText: Resistance is futile --- and we have Zushi

cards.name: Molotov
cards.description: 2 damage to a zombie, and adjacent zombies
cards.flavorText: Not suitable for n00bs and lightweights

cards.name: Bat
cards.description: 2 damage to a zombie and Distract it
cards.flavorText: Simple but soooo effective

cards.name: Super Serum
cards.flavorText: Captain Zamberica - here we goo!!

cards.name: Buffer
cards.flavorText: Be like the water - only with air

cards.name: Whiffer
cards.description: Entry: Return an ally zombie to your Hand
cards.flavorText: Get back here

cards.name: Dragger
cards.description: Entry: Summon a zombie from your Hand that costs 2 or less
cards.flavorText: There's more where this came from!

cards.name: Zyclone
cards.description: Entry: Return all zombies that cost 3 or less to their owners' Hands
cards.flavorText: A little anti-social... with a dash of anger issues

cards.name: Pebble
cards.description: Entry: 1 damage to a random enemy zombie
cards.flavorText: Always forgets his head... everywhere...

cards.name: Crumbz
cards.flavorText: Time is our greatest adversary

cards.name: Protector
cards.description: Heavy, Death: Give a random ally zombie Heavy
cards.flavorText: Always use protection

cards.name: Defender
cards.description: Entry: Give all ally Earth zombies that cost 2 or less Heavy
cards.flavorText: Forecast was clear skies... no one said fireball shower

cards.name: Firecaller
cards.flavorText: Is it a vision of the future or another dimension? Who knows?!

cards.name: RabieZ
cards.description: Feral, Death: Give a random ally zombie Feral
cards.flavorText: Red eyes - check! Foam in mouth - check! Shaking - check! Here, take an advil.

cards.name: Enrager
cards.flavorText: Don't get him angry, you won't like him when he's angry.

cards.name: Supply Drop
cards.description: Each player puts a random zombie from their deck into play
cards.flavorText: "Geronimo!"

cards.name: Junk Spear
cards.description: Damage enemy Overlord equal to the number of Items you've played
cards.flavorText: Where have I seen this contraption rising 4 times before?

cards.name: Zed Kit
cards.flavorText: Mending broken limbs since 1888

cards.name: Grower
cards.flavorText: That's the fifth arm he's lost today.

cards.name: EverlaZting
cards.description: Death: Shuffle this card into your deck
cards.flavorText: "Guess who's back?"

cards.name: Healz
cards.description: Entry: Overlord +3 Def; Overlord +5 Def if 10 Def or less
cards.flavorText: His buddy Jack would be proud

cards.name: Rainz
cards.description: Entry: Restore 10 Def randomly split among allies
cards.flavorText: Make it R-A-A-I-N-Z!!!

cards.name: Zcavenger
cards.description: Entry: Draw an Item card from your deck
cards.flavorText: A beton nya mombay m'bwa!

cards.name: Spikez
cards.flavorText: Come closer... it's never too close

cards.name: RelentleZZ
cards.flavorText: The best survival tactic: "never give up"

cards.name: Polluter
cards.flavorText: Spreading goo to a faucet near you

cards.name: HoZer
cards.description: Entry: Gets +1 Atk if you have a Water zombie in play
cards.flavorText: The undefeated spitting world champion, can hit a squirrel from 100ft

cards.name: FroZen
cards.flavorText: When grabbed - sing: "let it go, let it go.."

cards.name: Slider
cards.flavorText: Loves skating so so much!

cards.name: Zub-Zero
cards.description: Entry: 3 damage to a random enemy zombie, and Freeze it
cards.flavorText: Hates pointing things out...

cards.name: Zquall
cards.description: Entry: Put 2 Air zombies that cost 2 goo from your Hand to play
cards.flavorText: Not even close to Texas anymore

cards.name: Groundy
cards.description: Entry: If this is your only zombie in play, it gets Heavy
cards.flavorText:
"Saturday... again?! 
This cycle is getting on my nerves"

cards.name: Sparky
cards.flavorText: Hermes has NOTHING on him

cards.name: Rager
cards.description: Entry: If this is your only zombie in play, get Feral
cards.flavorText: Always dreamed of being Superman...

cards.name: Alpha
cards.description: Feral, Entry: Give 2 random ally Fire zombies Blitz
cards.flavorText: Let's huddle up and do a howl

cards.name: Volcan
cards.description: Cannot Attack. End: 5 damage to a random enemy
cards.flavorText: Loves to make it rain... RAIN of FIRE!

cards.name: Torch
cards.description: Destroy a random zombie that costs 3 goo or less
cards.flavorText: Bringing out the pyro-enthusiast in all of us

cards.name: Shopping Cart
cards.flavorText: Silly fun times... until someone loses an eye or a head!

cards.name: Leash
cards.description: Entry: Gain control of a random enemy zombie
cards.flavorText: No more BRAINZZZZZ

cards.name: Bulldozer
cards.flavorText: When you REALLY want to level (with) someone

cards.name: WiZp
cards.flavorText: Zeeee... peski littl-- oh its you?!

cards.name: Zplitter
cards.description: Entry: Place another copy of this zombie in play
cards.flavorText: Out, OUT...GET OUT!!!

cards.name: Zeeder
cards.flavorText: You reap what you sow

cards.name: Blight
cards.description: Delayed 2: Place two Blightlings in play then Destroy this
cards.flavorText: If you plant it they will come... with a bang

cards.name: Zlopper
cards.flavorText: What a dragggg...

cards.name: Boomer
cards.flavorText: Wants to share his LOVE with everyone - free hugs?!?

cards.name: Zteroid
cards.description: Death: All ally zombies in play get +2 Atk until end of turn
cards.flavorText: Needs to flee from his fans, as they want his delicious insides

cards.name: Vortex
cards.description: Entry: Replace ally water zombies in play with stronger ones
cards.flavorText: ERR, never really be satisfied...

cards.name: Zplash
cards.description: Entry: 1 damage to a random enemy for each Water zombie in Hand
cards.flavorText: Hey gang, watch how I mow these chumps!

cards.name: Izicle
cards.description: Entry: 2 damage to an enemy if a Water zombie in play
cards.flavorText: He just looooves his icy skewer

cards.name: Zpring
cards.description: As long as this is in play, you have 1 extra goo
cards.flavorText: Can never have enough goo... here take a sip

cards.name: Boomstick
cards.description: 2 damage to 3 random zombies in play
cards.flavorText: Thank you for your service!

cards.name: Blightling
cards.flavorText: If you plant it they will come... with a bang

cards.name: FlowZ
cards.flavorText: Its death shall not be in vain

cards.name: Scab
cards.flavorText: Won't stop picking away at the enemy

cards.name: Kabomb
cards.flavorText: Thinks it's a mad genius -- it's half right!

cards.name: Zky
cards.flavorText: Up, up, and away!

cards.name: Zonic
cards.flavorText: Yells so loud, nobody wants to come near it

cards.name: Zwoop
cards.flavorText: Likes to kill-steal

cards.name: DuZt
cards.flavorText: "To dust you shall return!"

cards.name: Rubble
cards.flavorText: Finds pieces of itself all over the battlefield

cards.name: Flare
cards.flavorText: Ready, get set... Go!

cards.name: Huzk
cards.flavorText: An empty shell of what it was

cards.name: Wood
cards.flavorText: Make like a tree -- and leave!

cards.name: Trunk
cards.flavorText: If a tree falls in a forest and no one is around to hear it, does it make a sound?

cards.name: Gloop
cards.flavorText: Blub...blub...blub

cards.name: Bane
cards.flavorText: Occasionally can't tell friend from foe

cards.name: Ztink
cards.flavorText: Can't figure out why it's got no friends

cards.name: Brook
cards.flavorText: All tidal waves must start from a single drop

cards.name: Zolid
cards.flavorText: What happens when an unstoppable force meets an immovable object?

cards.name: Torchus
cards.flavorText: Great when paired with a Torchee

cards.name: Zteam
cards.flavorText: Its name is a paradox

cards.name: Bazooka
cards.flavorText: When you need a little extra firepower

cards.name: Harpoon
cards.flavorText: Great against legendary sea creatures

cards.name: Hot
cards.flavorText: Just as it says on the tin

skills.title: Harden
skills.description: Give +2 Def to your Overlord

skills.title: Stoneskin
skills.description: Give an ally Earth zombie +1 Def

skills.title: Fortify
skills.description: Give an ally Earth zombie Heavy

skills.title: Phalanx
skills.description: Give all ally Earth zombies +1 Def

skills.title: Fortress
skills.description: Give 2 random ally Earth zombies Heavy

skills.title: Fire Bolt
skills.description: Deal 1 damage to target

skills.title: Rabies
skills.description: Give an ally Fire zombie Feral

skills.title: Fireball
skills.description: Deal 2 damage to a target

skills.title: Mass Rabies
skills.description: Give 2 random ally Fire zombies Feral

skills.title: Meteor Shower
skills.description: Deal 2 damage to all zombies

skills.title: Freeze
skills.description: Freeze a zombie

skills.title: Ice Bolt
skills.description: Deal 2 damage to a target zombie. If it survives, Freeze it

skills.title: Ice Wall
skills.description: Add 2 Def to target Water zombie or your Overlord

skills.title: Shatter
skills.description: Destroy a Frozen enemy zombie

skills.title: Blizzard
skills.description: Freeze 2 random zombie enemies

skills.title: Push
skills.description: Spend remaining goo to return a zombie of equal cost, or less, to owner's hand

skills.title: Draw
skills.description: Draw a card

skills.title: Wind Shield
skills.description: Give a random ally Air zombie Guard

skills.title: Levitate
skills.description: Reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by 1

skills.title: Retreat
skills.description: Return all zombies to their owner's hand

skills.title: Poison Dart
skills.description: Deal 1 damage to an enemy

skills.title: Toxic Power
skills.description: Deal 1 damage to an ally Toxic zombie and give it +1 Atk

skills.title: Breakout
skills.description: Deal 1 damage to 5 random enemies

skills.title: Infect
skills.description: Destroy an ally Toxic zombie, deal its Atk to a random enemy zombie

skills.title: Epidemic
skills.description: Destroy an 2 random Toxic zombies, deal their Atk to 2 enemy zombies

skills.title: Healing Touch
skills.description: Restore 2 Def to an ally zombie

skills.title: Mend
skills.description: Restore 2 Def to your Overlord

skills.title: Resurrect
skills.description: Reanimate a random 3 goo-cost ally Life zombie

skills.title: Enhance
skills.description: Restore 2 Def to all ally Life zombies and your Overlord

skills.title: Reanimate
skills.description: Reanimate 2 random ally Life zombies
